name: csu-summer-ai-camp-2025-fullstack
description: Full-stack Student Risk Analysis application - Frontend (Next.js) + Backend (Python/ML)

scripts.dev:frontend: echo 'Starting frontend...' && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: echo 'Starting backend...' && cd backend && python3 -m http.server 8001
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
